title: Dil Dosti Dilemma
overview: Asmara's summer takes a turn when she's sent to her grandparents' neighbourhood as punishment. To save face, she pretends to be in Canada to her friends. Amid the traditional setting, she finds genuine friendships, life lessons, and a hint of romance. Yet, her hidden truth could ruin everything, Can she find the courage to be herself? Get ready for a story of friendship, growth, and twists!
